Name: Queen Mary
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Konstantinos' original recipe called for dushi buttons in place of sugar syrup. Sadly, while commonplace in his local market in Messinia , Greece, dushi buttons are a rarity in South London, England, hence our substitution.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Konstantinos Kollias at Armyra By Papaioannou, Messinia, Greece.
Nutrition: One serving of Queen Mary contains 206 calories
